long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I’m here discuss the future of Final Fantasy gaming series. ... If you’re interested in playing this game, you’ve to wait for the official release of Sony’s PlayStation 5 & Microsoft’s new Xbox. Besides, as of the now, Square Enix (Makers) have shifted their focus on the Final Fantasy 16
